title.narrative: RI 3- Les enfants d'age scolaire affectés par les urgences beneficient d'une prise en charge educative et psychosociale adaptée et continuent leur scolarisation
1. Number of people involved in education secteur trained in preparedness and management of emergencies.
2. Number of learning spaces constructed (to continue education during emergency situations).
3. Percentage of school aged children affected by emergencies who continued to realize their right to education.
